name: Fancy World: Earth of Crisis
overview: Fancy World - Earth of Crisis is a 2D single-screen platform game - a clone of Snow Bros with a girl as the main heroine who must save the Earth. The player must eliminate all enemies on screen (the heroine uses energy balls to shoot). After clearing the board, the player goes to the next level. Bosses appear every few levels. The player can find the hidden treasures in each level.
